modName: Sensible Skyforge - The Skyforge that Makes Sense
summary: So I've never liked the idea of the Skyforge being only a forge, Eorlund must be smelting and working on armor. I've added new items to the Skyforge to make it more convenient and more sensible.
descriptionHtml:
So I've never liked the idea of the Skyforge being only a forge, Eorlund must be smelting and working on armor. I've made a mod, because when I find an issue with the game, it must be fixed.
The Skyforge is rounded, so I wanted to build the mod around the Skyforge, while keeping the aesthetic and not making it look overdone. I feel that it keeps the style very well, and it functions well, however, it is my mod, so I am bias towards it. If you like the screenshots, try it for yourself.

[size=10][center][color=green][font=impact]SENSIBLE SKYFORGE v1.2.1[/color][/center][/size][/font]
[img=right]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53597-1-1402829181.jpg[/img]

Youtube video is currently being worked developed for v1.2, as well as new screenshots.

[center][size=5][color=green]Installation:[/size][/color][/center]
1. Download Nexus Mod Manager if you have not.
2. Click the shiny "Download with Manager" button.
3. Activate the mod in NMM
4. Profit

If Jesse Cox has taught me anything, it's to advertise like shameless whores. So please share my mod to help it get attention!

[size=10][center][color=green]IMPORTANT![/center][/color][/size]
When doing the companion's quest "Blood's Honor," disable this mod! When the companion's questline is finished, you can then enable the mod again!
author: The Smexy Potato aka The Cynical Necromancer
